sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_d5dee5601bbe061068eb0fe1f54bcbcc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time/><max_drift/><name>Aoop: [LEG] Fim de vigencia 20 dias</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2024-06-11 18:41:33</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 09:00:00</run_time><run_type>daily</run_type><script><![CDATA[var grObject = new GlideRecord('x_mdbda_tax_legis_object');
grObject.addEncodedQuery('validity_endISNOTEMPTY^requires_implementation=yes^state!=3');
grObject.query();
while(grObject.next()){
    var future = new GlideDateTime(grObject.getValue('validity_end'));
    var diff = GlideDateTime.subtract(new GlideDateTime(), future);
    var dias = (diff.getDayPart() +1);
    if(dias == '20'){
        //ativa a flag 'fim de vigencia' e mudar status para aberto
        grObject.setValue('state', 1);
        grObject.setValue('fim_de_vigencia', true);
        grObject.update();
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>gabriel.diogo@aoop.com.br</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-11 18:43:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>d5dee5601bbe061068eb0fe1f54bcbcc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Aoop: [LEG] Fim de vigencia 20 dias</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Tax Legis" source="x_mdbda_tax_legis">d10c9c8f1b704dd44a422021f54bcbe7</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Tax Legis">d10c9c8f1b704dd44a422021f54bcbe7</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_d5dee5601bbe061068eb0fe1f54bcbcc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>gabriel.diogo@aoop.com.br</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-12 17:52:49</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>
